name: SpeedCube (WestMac Games)
description:
Infinite runner game. The player switches lanes to move out of the way of procedurally generated red blocks. Try and get the highest score.

SpeedCube was developed in Unity, with C#.

Input

Input in SpeedCube is simple and straightforward.

  • Switch Lanes: A/D or Left/Right Arrows
  • Restart Game After Death: Space
  • Main Menu: Escape

SpeedCube has cheat codes! If you know a cheat code, do this to trigger it.

  1. Start a new game. Cheat codes can be inputted in the death screen or during a game. Not through the main menu.
  2. Hold down each key of the code simultaneously. Timing, order and other parameters are irrelevant. If a codes corresponding buttons are pressed simultaneously, it will activate.

NOTE: Cheat codes last for as long as you play the game. When the application is closed, you will have to re-enter them the next time you play.

The current record for highest score is held by: Manjot Mann - 213 - 01/11/2020

SpeedCube is open source! You can check out the source code here!
